title: Enhancing Learning Design Practical Competencies: Understanding Adoption Intentions of Educational IoT for Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of educational technology (EdTech) and experience in online learning environments
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three core functionalities of educational IoT technology and their applications in online learning.
Learners can analyze IoT adoption intentions among learner groups using technology acceptance models (TAM, TRI, etc.).
Learners can diagnose barriers to IoT implementation in educational settings (e.g., technology anxiety, security concerns) and propose improvement strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
